text: "Love Me Two Times" is a 1967 song by The Doors and is the second single from their second studio album Strange Days. It went to number 25 in the United States and number 31 in Canada. In 1990 it was covered by Aerosmith for the Mel Gibson movie Air America ==Notes== Category:1967 songs Category:The Doors songs Category:Aerosmith songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:Baroque pop songs
title: Love Me Two Times
